name: Hermann Snake
description:
Hermann Snake is a Pico-8 snake arcade game using Hermann Grids to create an optical illusion. The player can customize their gameplay experience and difficulty with the various options. 

Suggested combos:

  • Easy: game on normal and no collision penalty
  • Challenging: game on normal with collision penalty
  • Trippy Snake: game on hardcore with no collision penalty
  • Impossible: game on hardcore with collision penalty

Made for the Black and White gamejam of April 2021
